== Examples

=== Deduplicate based on Kafka key

The following configuration demonstrates a pipeline that deduplicates messages based on the Kafka key.

[source,yaml]
----
pipeline:
  processors:
    - dedupe:
        cache: keycache
        key: ${! meta("kafka_key") }

cache_resources:
  - label: keycache
    memory:
      default_ttl: 60s
----
